languages.text: {n}Клерк затравленно смотрит на вас, его имплант угрожающе трещит.{/n} "Вы уничтожили амбуллов? Х-хорошо, вычеркиваю их из описи. Сколько ран вы получили? Надо учесть пролитые единицы крови..."
languages.translation_comment: Второй вход: после боя с амбуллами
Второй вход: после боя с амбуллами

languages.text: {n}The clerk gives you a hounded look, his implant crackling ominously.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustained? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."
languages.original_text: {n}Клерк затравленно смотрит на вас, его имплант угрожающе трещит.{/n} "Вы уничтожили амбуллов? Х-хорошо, вычеркиваю их из описи. Сколько ран вы получили? Надо учесть пролитые единицы крови..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The clerk gives you a hounded look. His implant is crunching menacingly.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustain? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."

{n}The clerk gives you a hounded look, his implant crackling ominously.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustained? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."

languages.text: {n}El funcionario te lanza una mirada fanática mientras su implante restalla de forma siniestra.{/n} «¿Ha eliminado a los ambulls? B-bien. Los tacharé del inventario. ¿Cuántas heridas ha sufrido? Debo registrar las unidades de sangre derramada...».
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk gives you a hounded look, his implant crackling ominously.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustained? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El funcionario te lanza una mirada fanática mientras su implante restalla de forma siniestra.{/n} «¿Ha eliminado a los ambulls? B-bien. Los tacharé del inventario. ¿Cuántas heridas ha sufrido? Debo registrar las unidades de sangre derramada...».

languages.text: {n}职员警觉地看了你一眼，植入物发出了不祥的噼啪声。{/n}“你已经把所有蚁牛都消灭掉了？很……很好，我可以把它们从清单上划掉了。你受了多少伤？我必须计算流血量……”
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk gives you a hounded look, his implant crackling ominously.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustained? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."

traits.locale_text: {n}职员警觉地看了你一眼，植入物发出了不祥的噼啪声。{/n}“你已经把所有蚁牛都消灭掉了？很……很好，我可以把它们从清单上划掉了。你受了多少伤？我必须计算流血量……”

languages.text: {n}事務員はしつこく見回して、彼のインプラントが不吉にパチパチと音を立てる。{/n}「あなたはアンブルを排除しましたか？よ、よし。インベントリから彼らを消しておこう。どれくらい怪我をしましたか？血痕の数を数えなければ…」
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk gives you a hounded look, his implant crackling ominously.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustained? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."

traits.locale_text: {n}事務員はしつこく見回して、彼のインプラントが不吉にパチパチと音を立てる。{/n}「あなたはアンブルを排除しましたか？よ、よし。インベントリから彼らを消しておこう。どれくらい怪我をしましたか？血痕の数を数えなければ…」

languages.text: {n}Le greffier vous adresse un regard tourmenté tandis que son implant émet force crépitements sinistres.{/n} « Vous avez éliminé les ambulls ? B-bien. Je vais les rayer de l'inventaire. Combien de blessures avez-vous reçues ? Je dois consigner les unités de sang versé... »
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk gives you a hounded look, his implant crackling ominously.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustained? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le greffier vous adresse un regard tourmenté tandis que son implant émet force crépitements sinistres.{/n} « Vous avez éliminé les ambulls ? B-bien. Je vais les rayer de l'inventaire. Combien de blessures avez-vous reçues ? Je dois consigner les unités de sang versé... »

languages.text: {n}İmplantı uğursuzca çıtırdayan kâtip, avlanmış bir hayvan misali sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ambulları ortadan kaldırdınız mı? İ... İyi. Onları envanterden çıkarıyorum. Ne kadar yara aldınız? Dökülen kan birimlerini hesaba katmalıyım..."
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk gives you a hounded look, his implant crackling ominously.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustained? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."

traits.locale_text: {n}İmplantı uğursuzca çıtırdayan kâtip, avlanmış bir hayvan misali sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ambulları ortadan kaldırdınız mı? İ... İyi. Onları envanterden çıkarıyorum. Ne kadar yara aldınız? Dökülen kan birimlerini hesaba katmalıyım..."

languages.text: {n}Der Beamte wirft dir einen gehetzten Blick zu. Sein Implantat knistert unheilvoll.{/n} "Ihr habt die Ambullen getötet? G-gut. Dann streiche ich sie aus dem Inventar. Wie viele Verletzungen habt Ihr erlitten? Ich muss das vergossene Blut quantifizieren ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk gives you a hounded look, his implant crackling ominously.{/n} "You've eliminated the ambulls? G-good. I'm crossing them off the inventory. How many injuries have you sustained? I must account for the units of blood spilt..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Beamte wirft dir einen gehetzten Blick zu. Sein Implantat knistert unheilvoll.{/n} "Ihr habt die Ambullen getötet? G-gut. Dann streiche ich sie aus dem Inventar. Wie viele Verletzungen habt Ihr erlitten? Ich muss das vergossene Blut quantifizieren ..."
